name: Octane Advertising & Design
tagline: Fresno Full-service Advertising and Design Agency
description:
We are an eclectic group of inspiring creatives with various social, ethnic, and political backgrounds, beliefs and creative disciplines.
Our common thread is the work, and the challenges of cultivating the end users reaction to how they accept and react to a product or service we have developed and brought to market for our many clients. This common thread brings us together and most importantly fuels us for the for the purest form of collaboration.
